extendedInfo.description: The ShapeShot 3D Face Viewer allows you to view faces captured with the ShapeShot 3D Facial Capture System - interactively in 3D - using your mobile device.---The Most Realistic 3D Facial Captures in the WorldImagine using digital cameras to take three dimensional âsnapshotsâ of your friends and family. Just point and click, like you do with your camera today, and get amazing face images in 3D with high-resolution color!We Call This ShapeShotShapeShot includes the process of capturing your face in 3D, the digital model created from this capture, and the applications that use this high-resolution data.How ShapeShot WorksFour off-the-shelf digital cameras capture your image instantaneously.These images are then combined using proprietary software to create an accurate three-dimensional model of your face with textures.It's that simple - no makeup, no special preparations - just one snap of the cameras and your face is now in 3D!How Do I Get ShapeShot?You may either visit our facilities near Baltimore, Maryland or find us demoing ShapeShot at various tech conferences around the country.Visit www.shapeshot.com for more information on upcoming events.

reviews.title: Can\'t even log in
reviews.comment: I have an account, I have models of myself, I can log in through the browser. But I get nothing but an error when trying to log into the app
reviews.author: Samuel Brown-Steiner

reviews.title: Sux
reviews.comment: Spent 2 hours trying to rate the stupid app....went to the Webb site only another waste of time...DON\'T MIND JOINING A SITE JUST WISH THEY DIDN\'T MAKE IT SO HARD LOOKS COOL BUT NEGATIVE NOTICE FOR APP
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app, very cool!
reviews.comment: Amazing app, even with the included gallery of sample faces. Imagine what will be done next with the great apps coming.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t live
reviews.comment: near Baltimore...so can only view included 3D faces; good, but just wanted to suggest-  try Pic D + , here in Market - similar 3D effects - not the same deep depth- but use with any pic taken with your own Android camera. Free and paid version, I ended up buying it. This seems like what PicD does, but from four cameras- it has more depth, great effects, but pic D lets you use your own photo...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Amazing product, can\'t wait to see what comes next!
